title: Punto Vegano
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Vegan cafe/bar situated opposite Temple of Debod, 3 blocks from Ventura Rodriguez metro, since late-2014. Offers dishes such as quinoa burger, vegetable sausages, sandwiches, tortilla skewers, and desserts. Drinks offered include beer, organic drinks, tea, and vegetable drinks. On Sunday the kitchen makes ravioli by hand with Italian flour.
